entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Light snow and local blowing snow ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Clearing this afternoon. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy late this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CDT Saturday 18 March 2023
